Name: Vipul Singh
Title: One of the ancient Monastery
Review: Nice/ peaceful and very old construction.. even though there is no actual temple , there are stone carvings of lord Vishnu, hanuman, Buddha.

Name: SaddviAndalwala
Title: Wonderful but remote location
Review: The monastery's architecture is fascinating and the meditation halls are lavishly decorated. But the location of the monastery from the mainland of Ladakh is rather odd. It took me nearly 2 long hours to reach.

Name: Ramandeep M
Title: Land of Stupa's
Review: Its another famous monastery in Leh. You have ample options to choose and decide which one you need to visit. We visited this monastery and found peaceful.

Name: lotusdiamond
Title: Another Monastery !!!
Review: Located far away from the city of Leh. Very peaceful and calm place. You may like to spend some time doing meditation. Not much of lamas at this place and not a big place. Visit this place if you have free time else all monasteries look sme.

Name: PreetKSingh
Title: monastery ambience..
Review: yert little bit far from main city but eys it was worth going there.. ir eally enjoyed the peace, calmnes and the ambience of the monastery.. the lamas were very less in number as compared to the other monasteries.. but overall a decent visit it was...
